These pants have a little stretch to them, which is good. But they run very small. I already sized up on size and they are still too small in the waist. Big everywhere else though.
These are a little tight if you have thicker thighs. They fit well everywhere else. Great price and perfect for someone on a budget.

The fit was perfect! I'm 5'1" and 125-130 lbs. (Ordered 3x 30) These work jeans are so comfy that I wear it outside of work! It has some stretch to it which makes it perfect for all the bending, squatting, and climbing I do. Time will tell how long they last. I will definitely be ordering another pair just because they are so comfy! I wish wrangler would make FR hoodies for women!

I'm 45 and 5'3" 135lbs athletic build. I ordered the 5 32. The jeans are made of a some what thin but stretchy material. I've worn them for a week and can move comfortably in them how long they will last has been a question in my mind, however. But for now I am happy with them as I bought them when they were on sale for $80 some odd dollars due to overstock.

Very beautiful, fashionable, and durable. Unfortunately, for me, they were too long so I gifted to my taller friend and she loves them.

These pants are amazing

评论概述: Good enough, most flattering ones I've found.
评论详情: Need FR jeans for work and have tried 3 pairs, these are by far the most flattering (I don't need them to make my butt look amazing or anything, but I also don't want to look like I have giant elephant legs). I wish they were higher rise, I will definitely be making sure to wear them with longer shirts and I'm sure I'll be pulling them up constantly since I usually wear higher rise jeans. But they'll get the job done and I won't look terrible. They run a little big but I don't have time to return and reorder so they'll work. They're also longer than expected based on my measurements but thankfully my boots are clunky so they won't drag.
I have not purchased these jeans yet but I did see the darker one has more stretch fabric and the indigo is mostly cotton. Just a warning when purchasing.

These pants for Fire resistant are absolutely great! Its really hard to find good FR pants for women.  They are very soft to the touch and have plenty of stretch so when you work hard such as climbing are crawling these are great. I will def be getting another pair.

What I liked most is I never got droopy butt in these.  They hold their shape without stretching out.  Love the pockets too they aren’t too wide set. Comfortable to wear.  I only wear Wrangler jeans, usually QBaby Wrangler so this was fun to try and I was very pleased and will consider again.

评论概述: Sizing off and returns horrible - do not buy on amazon
评论详情: The size chart for this must be incredibly off. I couldn't even get these close to zipping and other pants with the same measurements fit fine. Return window was so short that I couldn't return these pricey pants that are too small. Do not buy these on amazon.
These jeans are made from a sturdy denim. They are stitched very well.  However, they run on the small side. I would recommend that you order one to two sizes larger than you normally wear.

These jeans are a nice, thick denim with almost no stretch (which is way too hard to find). They feel very high quality. Unfortunately, no way are these "mid-rise" as advertised. I wear a US women's size 10 (30 waist in Levis and at H&M); I am 5 foot 7, 165 pounds, with a short torso, wide hips, flat derriere, and long legs. I ordered these jeans in the "11W x 32L" size, and while they fit snugly, I had no trouble zipping them. Not only was the rise low enough to cause the dreaded "muffin top" effect, bending over showed a LOT of my undies. The fit reminded me of the jeans I used to wear back in the late 90s, when I was 20 years younger, 20 pounds lighter, and trying to show off my belly-button piercing; this low waist would have worked on that girl, but not on this middle-aged mom (who officially denies any body piercings, lol). Since these are supposed to be jeans for work, I'm not sure they would work for anyone (except plumbers.... ;-) Tl;dr Nicely constructed jeans, but the rise is too low for a work environment. If I had it to over, I would not have ordered these.

Nice thick heavy duty denim with no stretch to them. These I thought ran a little small especially in the thigh area and I couldn't wear them (I have large thighs). They are a tough pair of well made jeans and won't tear or rip easily. These are a "regular fit" jeans with no give so if your curvy you might want to order up a size.

评论概述: Moderately booty hugging. Unsure of fire retardant-ness, but they're compliant for work!
评论详情: These are moderately backside hugging jeans and fit me great. I typically wear a 34 in the waist, or an 11 in jeans and these fit nicely. The waist goes up a bit higher, but it lets me bend easier and gives me more room to bend without accidentally showing more flesh than I intend. Plus, they're in a 32 length, which is great for me with longer legs at 5'7". I don't know about the actual fire retardant-ness of them, but that's not something I want to actively test. They're CAT2 and compliant for work, which works out great for me. Comfy, dark wash, and they don't make things appear flatter than they are. They actually have a slight flare to the legs as a kind of 90s vibe, and they hug the hips nicely.
